nodes.text: The Ghost Ones was the name given to the mysterious and nomadic clan of Senali that lived without family ties. Considered troublemakers by the other Senali, they were known for creating rivalries between other clans over trivial matters. The Ghost Ones spoke out against the custom of Rutan and Senali royalty exchange children.

It was later discovered, after the Mission to Rutan, that the Ghost Ones were a work of fiction, created by Prince Taroon in order to discredit his brother, Prince Leed, so that Taroon himself would gain the throne of Rutan.
